Title: Authorizes virtual net energy metering
Summary: Authorizes virtual net energy metering; provides for the ownership and operation of energy generating equipment by municipalities and groups of farmers and businesses for their joint benefit; provides for the net energy metering of the electricity used by the members of such entities.
LawCode: Add ยง66-p, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to authorizing virtual net energy metering
